_design_notes.project_name: Dead Don't Talk (Junior High 2000 Words Ver.)
_design_notes.difficulty_focus: Complex Adjectives, Advanced Verbs, Abstract Nouns (-tion/-ment)

word_selection_rules.source: 教育部國中參考字彙表 (2000字)
exclude: Words easily confused with common short words

sentence_writing_rules.formatting: Sentence Case (Sentences MUST start with a Capital Letter)
sentence_writing_rules.note: Sentences should require sustained pronunciation flow (10-15 words).
